Text: I'm very sorry for asking, can't figure out how to unrar this files, if anyone can help that be great ;) thank you

@thirt: downlod WinRAR; click on any ONE of the WinRAR files contained in your torrent.  WinRAR will open.  Highlight file, click 'Extract to', choose your destination folder, hit OK and bob's your uncle.

Dear nellypaal, thank you for reply :) was trying to open files with StuffIt Expander and WinRAR for Mac, had failure message that the structure of the archive is damaged. Got my old Vaio from the closed with old WinRAR version on it, BAM!!  Happy times ;) Great film!!
